35 /* Author: E. Gil Jones */
36 
37 #include <ros/ros.h>
38 #include <chomp_motion_planner/chomp_planner.h>
39 #include <chomp_motion_planner/chomp_trajectory.h>
40 #include <chomp_motion_planner/chomp_optimizer.h>
41 #include <moveit/robot_state/conversions.h>
42 #include <moveit_msgs/MotionPlanRequest.h>
43 
44 namespace chomp
45 {
46 bool ChompPlanner::solve(const planning_scene::PlanningSceneConstPtr& planning_scene,
47  const planning_interface::MotionPlanRequest& req, const ChompParameters& params,
48  planning_interface::MotionPlanDetailedResponse& res) const
49 {
50  ros::WallTime start_time = ros::WallTime::now();
51  if (!planning_scene)
52  {
53  ROS_ERROR_STREAM_NAMED("chomp_planner", "No planning scene initialized.");
54  res.error_code_.val = moveit_msgs::MoveItErrorCodes::FAILURE;
55  return false;
56  }
57 
58  // get the specified start state
59  moveit::core::RobotState start_state = planning_scene->getCurrentState();
60  moveit::core::robotStateMsgToRobotState(planning_scene->getTransforms(), req.start_state, start_state);
61 
62  if (!start_state.satisfiesBounds())
63  {
64  ROS_ERROR_STREAM_NAMED("chomp_planner", "Start state violates joint limits");
65  res.error_code_.val = moveit_msgs::MoveItErrorCodes::INVALID_ROBOT_STATE;
66  return false;
67  }
68 
69  ChompTrajectory trajectory(planning_scene->getRobotModel(), 3.0, .03, req.group_name);
70  robotStateToArray(start_state, req.group_name, trajectory.getTrajectoryPoint(0));
71 
72  if (req.goal_constraints.size() != 1)
73  {
74  ROS_ERROR_NAMED("chomp_planner", "Expecting exactly one goal constraint, got: %zd", req.goal_constraints.size());
75  res.error_code_.val = moveit_msgs::MoveItErrorCodes::INVALID_GOAL_CONSTRAINTS;
76  return false;
77  }
78 
79  if (req.goal_constraints[0].joint_constraints.empty() || !req.goal_constraints[0].position_constraints.empty() ||
80  !req.goal_constraints[0].orientation_constraints.empty())
81  {
82  ROS_ERROR_STREAM("Only joint-space goals are supported");
83  res.error_code_.val = moveit_msgs::MoveItErrorCodes::INVALID_GOAL_CONSTRAINTS;
84  return false;
85  }
86 
87  const size_t goal_index = trajectory.getNumPoints() - 1;
88  moveit::core::RobotState goal_state(start_state);
89  for (const moveit_msgs::JointConstraint& joint_constraint : req.goal_constraints[0].joint_constraints)
90  goal_state.setVariablePosition(joint_constraint.joint_name, joint_constraint.position);
91  if (!goal_state.satisfiesBounds())
92  {
93  ROS_ERROR_STREAM_NAMED("chomp_planner", "Goal state violates joint limits");
94  res.error_code_.val = moveit_msgs::MoveItErrorCodes::INVALID_ROBOT_STATE;
95  return false;
96  }
97  robotStateToArray(goal_state, req.group_name, trajectory.getTrajectoryPoint(goal_index));
98 
99  const moveit::core::JointModelGroup* model_group =
100  planning_scene->getRobotModel()->getJointModelGroup(req.group_name);
101  // fix the goal to move the shortest angular distance for wrap-around joints:
102  for (size_t i = 0; i < model_group->getActiveJointModels().size(); i++)
103  {
104  const moveit::core::JointModel* model = model_group->getActiveJointModels()[i];
105  const moveit::core::RevoluteJointModel* revolute_joint =
106  dynamic_cast<const moveit::core::RevoluteJointModel*>(model);
107 
108  if (revolute_joint != nullptr)
109  {
110  if (revolute_joint->isContinuous())
111  {
112  double start = (trajectory)(0, i);
113  double end = (trajectory)(goal_index, i);
114  ROS_INFO_STREAM("Start is " << start << " end " << end << " short " << shortestAngularDistance(start, end));
115  (trajectory)(goal_index, i) = start + shortestAngularDistance(start, end);
116  }
117  }
118  }
119 
120  // fill in an initial trajectory based on user choice from the chomp_config.yaml file
121  if (params.trajectory_initialization_method_.compare("quintic-spline") == 0)
122  trajectory.fillInMinJerk();
123  else if (params.trajectory_initialization_method_.compare("linear") == 0)
124  trajectory.fillInLinearInterpolation();
125  else if (params.trajectory_initialization_method_.compare("cubic") == 0)
126  trajectory.fillInCubicInterpolation();
127  else if (params.trajectory_initialization_method_.compare("fillTrajectory") == 0)
128  {
129  if (!(trajectory.fillInFromTrajectory(*res.trajectory_[0])))
130  {
131  ROS_ERROR_STREAM_NAMED("chomp_planner", "Input trajectory has less than 2 points, "
132  "trajectory must contain at least start and goal state");
133  return false;
134  }
135  }
136  else
137  {
138  ROS_ERROR_STREAM_NAMED("chomp_planner", "invalid interpolation method specified in the chomp_planner file");
139  return false;
140  }
141 
142  ROS_INFO_NAMED("chomp_planner", "CHOMP trajectory initialized using method: %s ",
143  (params.trajectory_initialization_method_).c_str());
144 
145  // optimize!
146  ros::WallTime create_time = ros::WallTime::now();
147 
148  int replan_count = 0;
149  bool replan_flag = false;
150  double org_learning_rate = 0.04, org_ridge_factor = 0.0, org_planning_time_limit = 10;
151  int org_max_iterations = 200;
152 
153  // storing the initial chomp parameters values
154  org_learning_rate = params.learning_rate_;
155  org_ridge_factor = params.ridge_factor_;
156  org_planning_time_limit = params.planning_time_limit_;
157  org_max_iterations = params.max_iterations_;
158 
159  std::unique_ptr<ChompOptimizer> optimizer;
160 
161  // create a non_const_params variable which stores the non constant version of the const params variable
162  ChompParameters params_nonconst = params;
163 
164  // while loop for replanning (recovery behaviour) if collision free optimized solution not found
165  while (true)
166  {
167  if (replan_flag)
168  {
169  // increase learning rate in hope to find a successful path; increase ridge factor to avoid obstacles; add 5
170  // additional secs in hope to find a solution; increase maximum iterations
171  params_nonconst.setRecoveryParams(params_nonconst.learning_rate_ + 0.02, params_nonconst.ridge_factor_ + 0.002,
172  params_nonconst.planning_time_limit_ + 5, params_nonconst.max_iterations_ + 50);
173  }
174 
175  // initialize a ChompOptimizer object to load up the optimizer with default parameters or with updated parameters in
176  // case of a recovery behaviour
177  optimizer =
178  std::make_unique<ChompOptimizer>(&trajectory, planning_scene, req.group_name, &params_nonconst, start_state);
179  if (!optimizer->isInitialized())
180  {
181  ROS_ERROR_STREAM_NAMED("chomp_planner", "Could not initialize optimizer");
182  res.error_code_.val = moveit_msgs::MoveItErrorCodes::PLANNING_FAILED;
183  return false;
184  }
185 
186  ROS_DEBUG_NAMED("chomp_planner", "Optimization took %f sec to create", (ros::WallTime::now() - create_time).toSec());
187 
188  bool optimization_result = optimizer->optimize();
189 
190  // replan with updated parameters if no solution is found
191  if (params_nonconst.enable_failure_recovery_)
192  {
193  ROS_INFO_NAMED("chomp_planner",
194  "Planned with Chomp Parameters (learning_rate, ridge_factor, "
195  "planning_time_limit, max_iterations), attempt: # %d ",
196  (replan_count + 1));
197  ROS_INFO_NAMED("chomp_planner", "Learning rate: %f ridge factor: %f planning time limit: %f max_iterations %d ",
198  params_nonconst.learning_rate_, params_nonconst.ridge_factor_,
199  params_nonconst.planning_time_limit_, params_nonconst.max_iterations_);
200 
201  if (!optimization_result && replan_count < params_nonconst.max_recovery_attempts_)
202  {
203  replan_count++;
204  replan_flag = true;
205  }
206  else
207  {
208  break;
209  }
210  }
211  else
212  break;
213  } // end of while loop
214 
215  // resetting the CHOMP Parameters to the original values after a successful plan
216  params_nonconst.setRecoveryParams(org_learning_rate, org_ridge_factor, org_planning_time_limit, org_max_iterations);
217 
218  ROS_DEBUG_NAMED("chomp_planner", "Optimization actually took %f sec to run",
219  (ros::WallTime::now() - create_time).toSec());
220  create_time = ros::WallTime::now();
221  // assume that the trajectory is now optimized, fill in the output structure:
222 
223  ROS_DEBUG_NAMED("chomp_planner", "Output trajectory has %zd joints", trajectory.getNumJoints());
224 
225  auto result = std::make_shared<robot_trajectory::RobotTrajectory>(planning_scene->getRobotModel(), req.group_name);
226  // fill in the entire trajectory
227  for (size_t i = 0; i < trajectory.getNumPoints(); i++)
228  {
229  const Eigen::MatrixXd::RowXpr source = trajectory.getTrajectoryPoint(i);
230  auto state = std::make_shared<moveit::core::RobotState>(start_state);
231  size_t joint_index = 0;
232  for (const moveit::core::JointModel* jm : result->getGroup()->getActiveJointModels())
233  {
234  assert(jm->getVariableCount() == 1);
235  state->setVariablePosition(jm->getFirstVariableIndex(), source[joint_index++]);
236  }
237  result->addSuffixWayPoint(state, 0.0);
238  }
239 
240  res.trajectory_.resize(1);
241  res.trajectory_[0] = result;
242 
243  ROS_DEBUG_NAMED("chomp_planner", "Bottom took %f sec to create", (ros::WallTime::now() - create_time).toSec());
244  ROS_DEBUG_NAMED("chomp_planner", "Serviced planning request in %f wall-seconds",
245  (ros::WallTime::now() - start_time).toSec());
246 
247  res.error_code_.val = moveit_msgs::MoveItErrorCodes::SUCCESS;
248  res.processing_time_.resize(1);
249  res.processing_time_[0] = (ros::WallTime::now() - start_time).toSec();
250 
251  // report planning failure if path has collisions
252  if (not optimizer->isCollisionFree())
253  {
254  ROS_ERROR_STREAM_NAMED("chomp_planner", "Motion plan is invalid.");
255  res.error_code_.val = moveit_msgs::MoveItErrorCodes::INVALID_MOTION_PLAN;
256  return false;
257  }
258 
259  // check that final state is within goal tolerances
260  kinematic_constraints::JointConstraint jc(planning_scene->getRobotModel());
261  const moveit::core::RobotState& last_state = result->getLastWayPoint();
262  for (const moveit_msgs::JointConstraint& constraint : req.goal_constraints[0].joint_constraints)
263  {
264  if (!jc.configure(constraint) || !jc.decide(last_state).satisfied)
265  {
266  ROS_ERROR_STREAM_NAMED("chomp_planner", "Goal constraints are violated: " << constraint.joint_name);
267  res.error_code_.val = moveit_msgs::MoveItErrorCodes::GOAL_CONSTRAINTS_VIOLATED;
268  return false;
269  }
270  }
271 
272  return true;
273 }
274 } // namespace chomp
chomp::ChompPlanner::solve
bool solve(const planning_scene::PlanningSceneConstPtr &planning_scene, const planning_interface::MotionPlanRequest &req, const ChompParameters &params, planning_interface::MotionPlanDetailedResponse &res) const

static double shortestAngularDistance(double start, double end)
Definition: chomp_utils.h:109

chomp::robotStateToArray
static void robotStateToArray(const moveit::core::RobotState &state, const std::string &planning_group_name, Eigen::MatrixXd::RowXpr joint_array)
Definition: chomp_utils.h:86
